entry.title: They are trying to find a way to keep our numbers down, this is...
entry.content:
Abolish ICE Denver shared an episode of Rebel HQ.

They are trying to find a way to keep our numbers down, this is not a coincidence

For the past 20 years there have researches done suggesting that Caucasian Americans would be the Minority in the United States.

And that the new Majority would be Latin American followed by African Americans....
These researches also suggested it would happen this Decade, 2020s

They are trying to secure they're place in this country as the majority as they have time and time again, despite violating human rights, despite putting people through traumatic experiences

This is not the first time is Government has done things like this to People of Color.

Truth is they see us a population that needs to be controlled and shaped into what they deem to be acceptable.

See MoreRebel HQREPORT: ICE Forcefully Sterilized Women In "Concentration Camp"The Breakdown posted an episode of Rebel HQ.

REPORT: ICE Forcefully Sterilized Women In "Concentration Camp"

Comment your thoughts below.

Follow Rebel HQ on Facebook: facebook.com/RebelHQ

From Yessenia: The Blanco Mart√≠nez family is one of the families that‚Äôs been with Sanctuary4All for two years. It‚Äôs a family under a deportation order and right... now we need your help. entry.title: Abolish ICE DenverBrittney Buckley is at GEO Aurora Ice Processing Center. ¬∑ InstagramReports of COVID outbreaks & coverups, inedible food,...
entry.content:
Abolish ICE DenverBrittney Buckley is at GEO Aurora Ice Processing Center. ¬∑ Instagram

Reports of COVID outbreaks & coverups, inedible food, filthy conditions, and medical neglect (from withholding cancer & HIV meds to refusing dental care & COVID... treatment) are not new. Reports of solitary confinement for speaking out about it... also not new. ‚Å£
‚Å£
We‚Äôve heard all this & more directly from detainees here in Aurora. We spent all summer watching guards exit & enter without masks, watching ambulances come & go under the cover of night, hearing from detainees & newly released people that the outbreak numbers were severely underreported. ‚Å£
‚Å£
Reports of mass sterilizations of unwilling or coerced women... also not new. The U.S. government has been sterilizing women of color without their consent since the colonizers got here. ‚Å£
‚Å£
The Nazis even got it from us. Literally. Concentration camp ‚Äúdoctors‚Äù were inspired by the systemic sterilization of Indigenous women in California. And just ten years ago, the governor of CA finally got around to banning the sterilization of prisoners as a form of birth control. ‚Å£
‚Å£
But this week, a lot more people are paying attention. ‚Å£
‚Å£
Thanks to a brave whistleblowing nurse in Georgia, the veil is lifting a little more, and ICE is losing more of that secrecy it needs so badly to keep violating human rights under the guise of patriotism. ‚Å£
‚Å£
They can build fence after fence to hide the truth & hide from us... but their evil is still clear, and it‚Äôs getting clearer. Make no mistake: it‚Äôs deliberate, it‚Äôs systemic, and it‚Äôs long past time to dismantle it by any means necessary. ‚Å£
‚Å£
If not now, when? Serious question. Never again is right fucking now. ‚Å£
‚Å£
#AbolishICE #FreeThemAll @ GEO Aurora Ice Processing Center

See More

entry.title: Abolish ICE Denver+7Black LGBTQ Migrant Project - BLMPThe forced migration of Black people is an ongoing legacy of colonization and slavery....
entry.content:
Abolish ICE Denver+7Black LGBTQ Migrant Project - BLMP

The forced migration of Black people is an ongoing legacy of colonization and slavery.

This legacy is being amplified and expanded to continue the war on Black... people and Black people migrating for their safety.

This is US Imperialism and it is a critical piece of the machine which wages War on Black People.

We see this in the every day experiences of our Black Trans and Queer Migrant community, we see it as we continue to work to #FREESzaSza and detention defense work, and we see it clearly in the actions of this current administration and the history of this Anti- Black police state.

We see it in yesterday‚Äôs news of the Federal Appeals court allowing this administration to terminate Temporary Protected Status (TPS) and in the June proposal of slashing and making significant changes to the US asylum system- which the graphics on this post share more information around.

Support Black Migrants working to both #AbolishICE and #AbolishPolice - who are working to shape and create a world where we are not forced to migrate for our safety only to be targeted on the lands where we seek refuge.

Black Queer Migrants are often hit first and worst in the many intersections of US Imperialism. If you are committed to liberation for ALL- it is critical the larger movement community knows this And acts accordingly.

Do not speak for us. Do not dilute our demands.
Do not erase us.

Connect with us, amplify our work, donate your resources and time, and LISTEN to Black migrants in this ongoing struggle.

#BlackMigrantsMatter
#BlackQueerMigrants
#BLMP
#BlackTransPower

See More

entry.title: Content warning: forced sterilization, severe human rights...
entry.content:
Abolish ICE Denver

Content warning: forced sterilization, severe human rights abuses, eugenics, genocide
.
.
.
"According to the new complaint, Wooten reported an alarmingly high rate of hysterectomies ‚Äì a surgery in which part or all of the uterus is removed ‚Äì being performed on Spanish-speaking immigrants, many of whom did not appear to understand why they had undergone the procedure (...) One woman said she was not properly anesthetized during a procedure and overheard the doctor say he had mistakenly removed the wrong ovary, rendering her unable to have children.‚Äù

Nurse Dawn Wooten says she was demoted and reprimanded when she spoke out about practices at Georgia detention center

theguardian.com

Ice detainees faced medical neglect and hysterectomies, whistleblower alleges
